Natures Bounty
















 


 














Absorbable Calcium plus Vitamin D3 200 Softgels




Calcium is the most prominent mineral found in our body, with a majority of it stored in our teeth and bones. Many foods contain high amounts of calcium, but for when you need to help support your calcium intake Nature’s Bounty Absorbable Calcium is easy to add to your daily routine. Our soft gels are supplemented with vitamin d and helps maintain your bones and teeth.














 


 














Absorbable Calcium plus Vitamin D3 100 Softgels




Calcium is the most prominent mineral found in our body, with a majority of it stored in our teeth and bones. Many foods contain high amounts of calcium, but for when you need to help support your calcium intake Nature’s Bounty Absorbable Calcium is easy to add to your daily routine. Our soft gels are supplemented with vitamin d and helps maintain your bones and teeth.














 


 














Calcium with Vitamin D3 Gummies




Our delicious Calcium with Vitamin D3 Gummies provide a unique way for your body to get Calcium, which helps maintain your bones and teeth. Naturally flavoured in cherry and orange, you'll look forward to adding them to your daily routine.














 


 
















Boost Mango Lassi



            
            
            
            BOOST Vanilla Simply+ Mango Lassi is a refreshing and nourishing delight made with just five ingredients. Not only is this quick and easy to make but it is also packed with goodness that will leave you feeling satisfied. The combination of the smooth vanilla flavour and the natural sweetness of mangoes creates a harmonious blend. For added richness, sprinkle crushed pistachios, dried rose petals…

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Cookies Details‎
Performance Cookies
 
 
Performance Cookies
 
These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Targeting Cookies

They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Social Media Cookies
 
 
Social Media Cookies

Extra Strength Hair Skin Nails Gummies




Hair, Skin & Nails lovers, this one's for you! These strawberry cream flavoured gummies have over 2x the biotin as our regular formula, with 6000mcg per serving! Healthier hair, skin and nails awaits!














 


 














Folic Acid




A part of the B-Family of vitamins, Folic Acid is especially important during times of rapid tissue growth such as infancy and pregnancy. This yeast-free vegetarian formula provides 1mg of Folic Acid per tablet, and helps to prevent neural tube defects when taken prior to becoming pregnant and during early pregnancy.














 


 














Lutein 40mg




Lutein is a carotenoid that helps to to improve macular pigment optical density and reduce the risk of developing cataracts. Help maintain your eye health by adding Nature's Bounty Lutein to your routine.














 


 














Lutein with Omega 3




Lutein is one of the most abundant carotenoids found in fruits, vegetables and even plants like marigolds. In addition to supporting eye health, Nature's Bounty Lutein with Omega 3 helps to reduce the risk of developing cataracts














 


 














Natures Bounty Disney Encanto Multivitamin Gummies




For your kids, maintaining health has never been so fun with Nature's Bounty Disney Encanto Gummies! Available in tasty fruit flavours of grape, orange, and cherry that your kids will love!

Savoury NESCAFE Flavoured Beef Tourtière



            
            
            
            This savoury pie is a classic French-Canadian meal traditionally enjoyed as part of the Christmas Eve feast. This recipe is typically handed down through generations, with every family preparing a slight variation on the type of meat used for the pie. Here, Nescafé Rich and Maggi Seasoning bring depth and dimension — sure to become a new family favourite this holiday season
        












 


 
















Spicy Thai Coconut Soup



            
            
            
            This soup, otherwise known in Thailand as Tom Kha, gets its name from tom, meaning soup, and kha, meaning “galangal,” a type of aromatic root vegetable. Make this quick and easy Thai classic at home, fragrant with herbs and spices, for dinner tonight.



Some of the products used in these recipes are not available for purchase Canada. Therefore we encourage you wherever possible to…
        












 


 
















Spicy Vegetarian Chineseinspired Breakfast Crepes



            
            
            
            Inspired by popular Chinese street food, these jianbing-style savoury crepes are packed with texture, colour, and flavour, and are balanced with the perfect amount of heat! Using carbonated water for the batter results in a fluffy, delicate consistency for these vegetarian breakfast crepes.
        












 


 














SMARTIES Easter Chocolate Egg Hunt Kit




Spring into Easter with chocolaty eggs ready for an exciting Easter egg hunt. NESTLÉ SMARTIES Milk Chocolaty Easter Egg Hunt Kit (140 g) is a ready-to-hide set of hollow, milk chocolaty eggs filled with miniature SMARTIES candy-coated milk chocolate pieces.














 


 














Smarties Strawberry




SMARTIES is bringing a favourite fruit flavour to the palm of your hands in bit sized pieces. Just in time for summer, NESTLÉ SMARTIES Strawberry (45g) is a limited-edition flavour that combines delicious milk chocolate with strawberry flavour. Each box contains the delicious combination of milk chocolate coated in vibrant red strawberry flavour candy shells.

MAGGI Juicy Jamaican Jerk Chicken



            
            
            
            A classic throughout the Caribbean but famously known as a Jamaican staple, this beloved style of barbecue finds its roots from the Spanish term charqui, which means “dried strips of meat” and is reflective of the jerky-style texture and smoky flavour of meats cooked over burning coals.
        












 


 
















Masala Vegetable Fritter Eggs Benedict



            
            
            
            Using whole veggies, and Indian-style garam masala – a fragrant spice blend made with a blend of warm, fragrant spices – this delicious twist on a brunch-time favourite is sure to be a delicious and eco-friendly hit! Blender hollandaise makes preparation a breeze, so less time is spent fussing in the kitchen and more time can be spent eating and enjoying around the table!
        












 


 
















Pad Thai arcenciel sans noix | Découvrez Fait avec Nestlé



            
            
            
            Pad Thai was created in the 1930s in Thailand by Plaek Phibunsongkhram, who was the prime minister at the time. Noodles are economical to produce and could be dried and kept for long periods of time. The amount of rice used to make noodles was 50 per cent of what would be consumed if it was eaten unprocessed, so noodles essentially doubled Thailand’s rice stores. Colorful vegetables stir-fried…
        












 


 
















QUALITY STREET Nankhatai



            
            
            
            Our decadent Nankhatai are imbued with the irresistible aroma of cardamom, caramel, and chocolate! QUALITY STREET Sweets make these Nankhatai unique as no two cookies taste the same! Serve these golden brown cookies with a cup of chai to your guests while they are still soft, gooey and warm from the oven! These Nankhatai cookies are the perfect celebration treat for Diwali and the holiday season.
        












 


 
















Savory Breakfast Belizean Fry Jacks



            
            
            
            Similar to beignets from New Orleans, these delicious pieces of fried dough are a popular staple in Belize, as well as throughout the Caribbean and Latin America. Commonly enjoyed for breakfast as fuel for the day ahead, fry jacks can be eaten sweet or savoury depending on the accompanying toppings and condiments.

Vanilla Caramel Half Dipped Frozen Dessert Bars




Delight in the decadent tastes and textures of PARLOUR Vanilla Caramel flavoured frozen dessert bars. These delicious frozen treats feature smooth, creamy vanilla flavoured frozen dessert on one side and sweet and light caramel flavoured frozen dessert on the other, all half dipped in a crackly, chocolatey coating.














 


 
















AERO and TURTLES Bite Size Chocolate Pecan Rugelach



            
            
            
            Deriving from the Yiddish word meaning “little twists,” these delicious bite-size cookies are traditionally served during Hanukkah, and can be made with dried fruit, nuts, jams or, as in this recipe, chocolate! Aero and chocolate add decadence and delight to this holiday favourite
        












 


 
















Crispy Vegetarian Cauliflower Pakoras



            
            
            
            These crispy Indian-inspired pakoras are made using the Cauliflower crown, stems and leaves to make a perfect vegetarian snack. Carbonated water helps to create the perfect crunch when used in the batter. Creamy herbed yogurt dip offers a refreshing balance to these flavourful bite-sized delights and is a great way to use up fresh herbs that are past their prime.
        












 


 
















KITKAT BUNNY COCONUT MOUSSE



            
            
            
            Smooth, creamy, and decadent... these are just SOME of the amazing descriptors for out KitKat Coconut mousse. If you're looking for something new to try this Easter, you've found it.
        












 


 
















KITKAT BUNNY EASTER EGG



            
            
            
            Stop the hunt! We have found the perfect Easter egg recipe for everyone in the family to enjoy! Hop on board with KitKat bunnies and Smarties eggs for a delicious treat you won't want to miss!

St Johns Wort




Dating back to the ancient Greeks, St. John's Wort is a perennial plant native to Europe, with oval-shaped leaves and golden yellow flowers. St. John's Wort is traditionally used as a sedative for relief of restlessness or nervousness, and to help treat symptoms of sleep disorders.














 


 














Vegetarian Vitamin D3 2500 IU 90 Tablets




If you're looking to prevent vitamin D deficiency, Nature's Bounty Vegetarian Vitamin D 2500 IU is perfect for you. Vitamin D intake, when combined with sufficient calcium, a healthy diet and regular exercise, may reduce the risk of developing osteoporosis in people with vitamin D deficiency.


Available in value size.














 


 














Vitamin B12 1500 mcg




Vitamin B-12, also known as Cyanocobalamin, is primarily obtained from animal sources but is not found in vegetables in any significant amount. This essential vitamin plays a role in helping the body metabolize carbohydrates, fats and proteins, while also helping to form red blood cells.














 


 














NESCAFE RICH Iced




NESCAFÉ Iced Instant Coffee makes a refreshing and delicious iced coffee in an instant! From the experts in coffee innovations, NESCAFÉ Iced Instant Coffee is made to dissolve quickly and easily in cold water or milk -- no need to mix with hot water first.














 


 














Juicy Pops Mango Peach Cherry Flavoured Ice Pops




Enjoy the summer-fresh flavours of Mango Peach and Cherry in this share pack of PARLOUR Juicy Pops. Made with fruit juice, these ice pops come in a pack of 20, so there's plenty of refreshing fruity goodness to go around. The perfect treat, PARLOUR Juicy Pops are only 60 calories per serving and are made with no artificial colours and no artificial flavours.

Elderberry Gummies




Helps to support immune function. An antioxidant that helps to protect cells against free radicals. Take 2 delicious gummies per day!Contains Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E, Zinc, and European Elderberry! Maintains good health.














 


 














Absorbable Calcium plus Vitamin D3
















 


 














Natures Bounty Osteo BiFlex Glucosamine + Turmeric




It doesn’t matter how you move as long as you are doing it. It’s time to be your best self and not let anything stand in your way. Backed by years of commitment from scientists, researchers and technicians, Osteo Bi-Flex shows initial results in 5 days!














 


 














Natures Bounty Probiotic Gummies




Nature's Bounty Probiotic Gummies are a convenient and seamless way to include Probiotics into your everyday routine, bursting with the delicious fruit flavour of pineapple, raspberry and orange.














 


 














Sleep3 30 Trilayer Tablets




Nature's Bounty Sleep3 is a tri-layer tablet which help to temporarily promote relaxation, and increase total sleep time in people suffering from sleep restriction or an altered sleep schedule. Sleep 3 helps to speed up/ reduce the time it takes to fall asleep  in those who fall asleep slowly or suffer from delayed sleep phase disorder.


Get more sleep tonight, with Sleep3.

Acidophilus Probiotic




Acidophilus is a friendly bacteria for the digestive system. Nature's Bounty® Acidophilus Probiotic contains 2 billion active cells to help support healthy intestinal balance.














 


 














Alpha Lipoic Acid




Alpha Lipoic Acid (ALA) is known as the “universal antioxidant” for its ability to work in both the water-soluble and fat-soluble compartments in the cell. Nature's Bounty ALA helps fight free radicals in the body.














 


 














Biotin 5000 mcg




Biotin is a water-soluble vitamin found in oatmeal, vegetables, and soy. A part of the B-Family of vitamins, our easy to swallow softgels help to maintain healthy hair and skin while supporting nail health.














 


 














Conjugated Linoic Acid CLA




As a compliment to reduced dietary calories and increased physical activity, Nature's Bounty CLA may help support a modest reduction in fat mass and improvement to body composition.














 


 














Disney Princess Multivitamin Gummies 180




Help maintain the health of your children with Nature's Bounty Disney Princess Multivitamin gummies. These delicious naturally falvoured gummies help to maintain eyesight, skin, membranes and immune function.

DEL MONTE Tropical Mango Sorbet




Try DEL MONTE Tropical Mango Sorbet today and experience a refreshing escape to a sun-drenched paradise in every delicious spoonful! This delectable fruit sorbet is elevated refreshment for the entire family. Made with real mangoes, DEL MONTE Tropical Mango frozen sorbet lets you satisfy your tropical fruit cravings all year round.














 


 














Drumstick King Count Chocolate Fudge Brownie




DRUMSTICK Chocolate Fudge Brownie frozen dessert cones now come in king size! These 180mL frozen dessert cones combine creamy chocolate and vanilla flavoured frozen dessert, rich brownie pieces, a delicious chocolatey ripple, and a giant decadent nugget, all in a crispy king-size wafer cone.














 


 














Drumstick Strawberry Cheesecake




The iconic DRUMSTICK experience is now available in a tub! Everything you love about DRUMSTICK Strawberry Cheesecake cones -- creamy strawberry cheesecake flavoured frozen dessert, a delicious strawberry ripple, and graham pieces-- are now all mixed together in a scoopable, shareable treat, perfect for enjoying with friends and family.














 


 














Drumstick Vanilla Caramel




The iconic DRUMSTICK experience is now available in a tub! Everything you love about DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel cones -- creamy vanilla flavoured frozen dessert with a delicious caramel ripple, praline roasted peanuts, and crunchy chocolatey-covered wafer pieces -- are now all mixed together in a scoopable, shareable treat, perfect for enjoying with friends and family.














 


 














​ Nestlé CARNATION Turtles Hot Chocolate




CARNATION TURTLES hot chocolate mix will put a smile on your face, even on the chilliest days. A yummy blend of CARNATION hot chocolate with pecan and caramel notes, it's easy to prepare.

KitKat Mini Bars Frozen Dessert




Have a break, have a KITKAT mini frozen dessert bar! KITKAT mini frozen dessert bars are individually wrapped so you can easily enjoy them alone or share with family and friends.














 


 














DEL MONTE Coconut Pineapple Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars




What's better than the sweetness of nature? DEL MONTE Creamy Coconut Pineapple Frozen Fruit & Dairy Dessert Bars (10 x 50 ml) are made with the pure, creamy goodness of a blend of refreshing coconut flavouring with delicious real pineapple pieces that creates a flavourful frozen treat that'll satisfy those tropical fruit cravings, all year round.














 


 














DEL MONTE Raspberries and Chocolate Gelato




Enjoy the real fruit flavour of DEL MONTE Real Raspberries & Chocolate Gelato. This delicious frozen dessert is elevated refreshment for the entire family. Made with real raspberries, DEL MONTE Real Raspberries & Chocolate Gelato lets you satisfy your fruit and chocolate cravings all year round. Cool and refreshing, it's packed with the goodness of real fruit.














 


 














DEL MONTE Strawberry and Lemon Sorbet




Try DEL MONTE Real Strawberries & Lemon Sorbet today and experience a refreshing symphony of flavours in every delicious spoonful! This delicious fruit sorbet is elevated refreshment for the entire family. Made with real strawberries and lemons, DEL MONTE Real Strawberries & Lemon frozen sorbet lets you satisfy your fruit cravings all year round.

Targeting Cookies
 
 
Targeting Cookies
 
These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Social Media Cookies

They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
